edu.eur.absa.model

Class Relation

  • java.lang.Object
    • edu.eur.absa.model.DataEntity
      • edu.eur.absa.model.Relation
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    java.lang.Comparable<DataEntity>

    public class Relation
extends DataEntity
    A directed relation between two Annotatables. Can be used to directly link Words to their containing sentence or document or other textual unit that you need often so as to prevent much searching in the spans set.
    Author:
    Kim Schouten
